pageProps.aboutMeHTML:
Self-directed and motivated Sr Software Engineer

Software Engineer Who worked on several niche tech stack like

  • CEF(Chromium Embedded Framework) C++ based Integration
  • Indesign's C++ based Extension Development
  • QuarkXpress's C++ based Plugin development
While working on such niche tech-stack I always keep myself up-to-date with the market-leading tech stack
  • Hold More than 4+ years of professional experience in front-end development using React and Angular framework
  • Hold more than 3+ years of experience in Native Android development and React-native based Hybrid mobile development

I am a maker and I like building products. Additionally, I enjoy playing with datasets and mashing them up to create something useful.

In order to support myself as a maker, I also work on Open source projects.

To connect with me, feel free to tweet üê¶ @harshkurra or e-mail me :harshkurra21@gmail.com

sideBarInfo.profileShortBio: I am a full stack developer who loves writing code for a living. I am passionate about JavaScript, react, Material-UI, web development and Paneer.
